item.title: Welcome!!
item.author: Berkay Aktunç
item.description:
Welcome!

Hello! I’m Berkay Aktunç and this is my personal blog. Here I will share articles about software development, technology, programming and personal experiences with you.

About Me

  • Software Developer
  • Technology Enthusiast
  • Always eager to learn

What You’ll Find Here?

  • Articles about programming languages and technologies
  • My project experiences
  • Technology news and comments
  • Personal development notes

You can follow my social media accounts or use my RSS feed to follow my blog.
